channel.title: CVE Feed for Nheko-Reborn -- nheko
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nheko-Reborn -- nheko

item.title: CVE-2022-39264|2024-08-03T12:00:43.593Z -- nheko-reborn -- nheko
item.description: nheko is a desktop client for the Matrix communication application. All versions below 0.10.2 are vulnerable homeservers inserting malicious secrets, which could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks. Users can upgrade to version 0.10.2 to protect against this issue. As a workaround, one may apply the patch manually, avoid doing verifications of one's own devices, and/or avoid pressing the request button in the settings menu.
